attributes.additional_details:
The people are fed up, sick and tired of this Government not standing for for the people. We have all here had to suffer cuts or freezes to wages, services, jobs and benefits for the sake of austerity. Thousands have died when instead you should of been going after and holding responsible those who caused it, they are protected and given bonuses even when failing.

We call for a general election to be called early. As in NOW!
